TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpCompletionOption extends System.Enum

summary.para: Indicates if operations should be considered completed either as soon as a response is available, or after reading the entire response message including the content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption ResponseContentRead = int32(0)

summary.para: The operation should complete after reading the entire response including the content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Http.HttpCompletionOption ResponseHeadersRead = int32(1)

summary.para: The operation should complete as soon as a response is available and headers are read. The content is not read yet.
